trans-unit.source: Provides an in-depth log of the substitution or validation execution.

seg-source.mrk: Provides an in-depth log of the substitution or validation execution.

target.mrk: 代入またはチェック実行の詳細なログを提供します。

trans-unit.source: The log detail page provides an in-depth log of the substitution or validation execution in runtime applications. The list of messages illustrates in a tree-like structure the processing flow when a set of rules for a specific event is triggered. Each log includes the following information from top to bottom:

seg-source.mrk: The log detail page provides an in-depth log of the substitution or validation execution in runtime applications.
The list of messages illustrates in a tree-like structure the processing flow when a set of rules for a specific event is triggered.
Each log includes the following information from top to bottom:

target.mrk: ログ詳細ページには、実行時アプリケーションの代入またはチェック実行の詳細なログが提供されます。
メッセージの一覧には、特定のイベントのルールセットがトリガされたときの処理フローが、ツリー型構造で示されます。
各ログには、上から順に以下の情報が含まれます。

trans-unit.source: A line depicting the event being processed, such as <sap-technical-name>FINS_ACC_CB_1</sap-technical-name> for <uicontrol>Coding Block</uicontrol>.

seg-source.mrk: A line depicting the event being processed, such as <sap-technical-name>FINS_ACC_CB_1</sap-technical-name> for <uicontrol>Coding Block</uicontrol>.

target.mrk: <uicontrol>コーディングブロック</uicontrol>の<sap-technical-name>FINS_ACC_CB_1</sap-technical-name>など、処理中のイベントを表示する行。

trans-unit.source: A line indicating the input document the substitution or validation applies to, such as <sap-technical-name>COBL</sap-technical-name> for <uicontrol>Coding Block</uicontrol> and <sap-technical-name>ACDOCU</sap-technical-name> for <uicontrol>Group Reporting Journal Entries</uicontrol>.

seg-source.mrk: A line indicating the input document the substitution or validation applies to, such as <sap-technical-name>COBL</sap-technical-name> for <uicontrol>Coding Block</uicontrol> and <sap-technical-name>ACDOCU</sap-technical-name> for <uicontrol>Group Reporting Journal Entries</uicontrol>.

target.mrk: <uicontrol>コーディングブロック</uicontrol>の<sap-technical-name>COBL</sap-technical-name>および<uicontrol>グループレポート仕訳</uicontrol>の<sap-technical-name>ACDOCU</sap-technical-name>など、代入またはチェックが適用される入力文書を表示する行。

trans-unit.source: Substitution or validation rule content structured in a way that illustrates the internal processing flow of the rule execution. The third column of this part additionally shows an excerpt of the substitution or validation script, which represents the rule in the backend execution.

seg-source.mrk: Substitution or validation rule content structured in a way that illustrates the internal processing flow of the rule execution.
The third column of this part additionally shows an excerpt of the substitution or validation script, which represents the rule in the backend execution.

target.mrk: 代入またはチェックルールのコンテンツは、ルール実行の内部処理フローを表すように構築されています。
この部分の 3 番目の列には、バックエンド実行でのルールを表す代入またはチェックスクリプトの抜粋が追加で表示されます。

trans-unit.source: The rule execution result, for example, if the precondition was met, which fields were subject to validation or substitution, was the validation successful or the substitution executed.

seg-source.mrk: The rule execution result, for example, if the precondition was met, which fields were subject to validation or substitution, was the validation successful or the substitution executed.

target.mrk: 前提条件が満たされていたか、どの項目がチェックまたは代入の対象であったか、チェックが正常に終了したか、または代入が実行されたかなどのルール実行結果。

trans-unit.source: Log lines formatted in gray color are less important and are included simply for completeness reasons.

seg-source.mrk: Log lines formatted in gray color are less important and are included simply for completeness reasons.

target.mrk: 灰色で書式設定されたログ行は重要度が低く、完全性のために含まれているだけです。
